[00:00.01]everytime (Explicit) - Ariana Grande
[00:00.02]Lyricist：Max Martin/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Savan Kotecha/Ariana Grande
[00:00.03]Composer：Max Martin/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Savan Kotecha/Ariana Grande
[00:00.04]Studio Personnel：Jeremy Lertola/Serban Ghenea/Cory Bice/John Hanes/Sam Holland
[00:00.05]Programmer：Ilya Salmanzadeh/Max Martin

[00:00.09]Assistant Recording Engineer：Jeremy Lertola/Cory Bice
[00:00.10]Keyboard：Max Martin/Ilya Salmanzadeh
[00:00.11]Mixing Engineer：John Hanes
[00:00.59]Back to you back to you back to you
[00:03.62]Back to you back to you back to you
[00:06.29]I go back to you back to you back to you everytime
[00:13.57]I get tired of your no-shows
[00:16.76]You get tired of my control
[00:19.98]They keep telling me to let go
[00:22.48]But I don't really let go when I say so
[00:26.52]I keep giving people blank stares
[00:29.74]I'm so different when you're not there
[00:33.01]It's like something out of Shakespeare
[00:35.50]Because I'm really not here when you're not there
[00:38.76]I've tried to fight our energy
[00:45.15]But everytime I think I'm free
[00:52.34]You get high and call on the regular
[00:55.39]I get weak and fall like a teenager
[00:58.70]Why oh why does God keep bringing me back to you
[01:05.08]I get drunk pretend that I'm over it
[01:08.48]Self-destruct show up like an idiot
[01:11.64]Why oh why does God keep bringing me back to you
[01:17.52]I go back to you back to you back to you
[01:21.40]Back to you back to you back to you
[01:24.12]I go back to you back to you back to you everytime
[01:31.32]Said when I get on a new wave
[01:34.79]Boy you look at me and I slip outta my lace
[01:38.01]They keep calling me a head-case
[01:40.42]'Cause I can't make a good case why we can't change
[01:43.61]I've tried to fight our energy
[01:50.03]But everytime I think I'm free
[01:57.19]You get high and call on the regular
[02:00.39]I get weak and fall like a teenager
[02:03.61]Why oh why does God keep bringing me back to you
[02:08.96]Back to you baby
[02:10.02]I get drunk pretend that I'm over it
[02:13.31]Self-destruct show up like an idiot
[02:16.46]Why oh why does God keep bringing me back to you
[02:22.37]I go back to you back to you back to you
[02:25.24]I go back to you
[02:26.36]Back to you back to you back to you
[02:28.79]Back to you
[02:29.32]I go back to you back to you back to you everytime
[02:35.65]I go back to you back to you back to you
[02:39.26]Back to you back to you back to you
[02:41.91]I go back to you back to you back to you everytime

[00:00.59]重回你身边 回到你身边
[00:03.62]重回你身边 回到你身边
[00:06.29]每一次我都会重回你身边 回到你身边
[00:13.57]我厌倦了你的缺席
[00:16.76]你受不了我的掌控
[00:19.98]旁人不断告诫让我离开你
[00:22.48]而我只是敷衍 我并不是真的想离开
[00:26.52]我总是茫然不解的注视着他们
[00:29.74]你不在我身边时 一切都截然不同
[00:33.01]就像莎士比亚笔下的人物
[00:35.50]不在你身边的我心也像是飘向远方
[00:38.76]厌倦了我们之间的争执不休
[00:45.15]就在每一次我认为我解脱的时候
[00:52.34]你总是会兴奋的给我打来电话
[00:55.39]而我像是个萎靡不振处在青春期的孩子
[00:58.70]为何 为何老天执意让我回到你的身边
[01:05.08]酩酊大醉的我假装一切都已过去
[01:08.48]自暴自弃 像是个傻瓜般现身于人前
[01:11.64]为何 为何老天执意让我回到你的身边
[01:17.52]我重回你身边 回到你身边
[01:21.40]重回你身边 回到你身边
[01:24.12]每一次我都会重回你身边 回到你身边
[01:31.32]每每我被推上风口浪尖
[01:34.79]男孩 你深情注视我的那一刻 我会主动褪去衣服
[01:38.01]他们一直说我已失去理智
[01:40.42]因为我无法应对这一切 为何我们不能做出改变
[01:43.61]厌倦了我们之间的争执不休
[01:50.03]就在每一次我认为我解脱的时候
[01:57.19]你总是会兴奋的给我打来电话
[02:00.39]而我像是个萎靡不振处在青春期的孩子
[02:03.61]为何 为何老天执意让我回到你的身边
